content: Charlotte, North Carolina, voted on Monday to support the city’s bid to host the 2020 Republican convention. But for some, the decision is directly opposed to the city’s progressive values. ,https://,nyti.ms/2NohEue, ,pic.twitter.com/45qd30mQtd
